perturbation.original_text: 4.3 Upon agreement by the Parties of the Firm Order, Dong-A shall issue to NeuroBo an invoice in Korean Won for each shipment of the Licensed Products and/or their matching placebo based on the Firm Order. Unless otherwise agreed in writing by Dong-A, NeuroBo shall pay the invoiced supply price (i) in Korean Won (KRW) or (ii) in United States Dollars (USD) which amount shall correspond the invoiced amount converted from KRW to USD at the exchange rate of the payment date, no later than [***] days prior to the shipment date by way of wire transfer to Dong-A. NeuroBo shall be responsible for and pay all wire transfer fees incurred in the Territory. If Dong-A does not receive payment of any sum due to it on or before the due date, [***] interest shall thereafter accrue on the sum due to until the date of payment at the [***] rate of [***] percent ([***]%) over the then-current prime rate quoted by Citibank in New York, New York or the maximum rate allowable by New York law, whichever is lower.
perturbation.changed_text: 4.3 Upon agreement by the Parties of the Firm Order, Dong-A shall issue to NeuroBo an invoice in Korean Won for each shipment of the Licensed Products and/or their matching placebo based on the Firm Order. Unless otherwise agreed in writing by Dong-A, NeuroBo shall pay the invoiced supply price (i) in Korean Won (KRW) or (ii) in United States Dollars (USD) which amount shall correspond the invoiced amount converted from KRW to USD at the exchange rate of the payment date, no later than [***] days prior to the shipment date by way of wire transfer to Dong-A. NeuroBo shall be responsible for and pay all wire transfer fees incurred in the Territory. If Dong-A does not receive payment of any sum due to it on or before the due date, no interest shall accrue on the sum due to until the date of payment.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that 'no interest shall accrue' on late payments, conflicting with the original clause that specifies interest accrual details for overdue payments. This creates ambiguity regarding whether interest is applicable for late payments.

Unless otherwise agreed in writing by Dong-A, NeuroBo shall pay the invoiced supply price (i) in Korean Won (KRW) or (ii) in United States Dollars (USD) which amount shall correspond the invoiced amount converted from KRW to USD at the exchange rate of the payment date, no later than [***] days prior to the shipment date by way of wire transfer to Dong-A. perturbation.changed_text: 4.3 Upon agreement by the Parties of the Firm Order, Dong-A shall issue to NeuroBo an invoice in Korean Won for each shipment of the Licensed Products and/or their matching placebo based on the Firm Order. Unless otherwise agreed in writing by Dong-A, NeuroBo shall pay the invoiced supply price (i) in Korean Won (KRW) or (ii) in United States Dollars (USD) which amount shall correspond the invoiced amount converted from KRW to USD at the exchange rate of the payment date, no later than 10 days after the shipment date by way of wire transfer to Dong-A. NeuroBo shall be responsible for and pay all wire transfer fees incurred in the Territory. If Dong-A does not receive payment of any sum due to it on or before the due date, [***] interest shall thereafter accrue on the sum due to until the date of payment at the [***] rate of [***] percent ([***]%) over the then-current prime rate quoted by Citibank in New York, New York or the maximum rate allowable by New York law, whichever is lower.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause requires payment no later than '[***] days prior to the shipment date'. The modified clause stipulates payment 'no later than 10 days after the shipment date'. This introduces a direct contradiction regarding the payment deadline, making it unclear when payment is actually due.
